item.description:
The hearts & spades has returned to a once-every-two-weeks format. Wednesdays are good for most everyone who have voiced a preference. Let's settle around that comfortable circular table that has brought so many good times in the past!

Yours in spades (and hearts!),
Harold
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for the Meetup group

group.name: The Arlington Hearts & Spades Meetup Group

item.name: Cards while it's still summer!
